name: Vampire Princess I - The Reckoning
description: Hi there - I am Jones. I make video games for fun. This is a project I made with my girlfriend. She did the pixelart and I the programming. It is part of a training we do right now to train for game jams. We made the version 0.1 in 15 hours and will work another 9 hours on another day for the boss enemy of the game. This is a short fun training project for gamejams. I will upload a full development video at somepoint and update the version. Love to you all <3
